workshoptitle: CloudWorld 2023: Intro to Kubernetes and Microservices for Oracle DBAs

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: The Introduction is always first. The title and contents menu title match for the Introduction.

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Provision and Configure the Cloud Infrastructure
tutorials.description: Using Oracle Resource Manager (ORM), Provision and Configure a Stack

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Understand Kubernetes
tutorials.description: Labs that follow the introduction are numbered, starting with Lab 1

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Bind to the Autonomous Database
tutorials.description: Bind the OraOperator to the ADB

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Create a Containerised Database
tutorials.description: Create a Containerised Single Instance Database with the OraOperator

tutorials.title: Lab 6: Perform Lifecycle Operations (ADB)
tutorials.description: Perform Lifecycle Operations against the ADB

tutorials.title: Lab 7: Perform Lifecycle Operations (SIDB)
tutorials.description: Perform Lifecycle Operations against the SIDB

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
